Package uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Controllers

Class DatabaseController

java.lang.Object
uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Controllers.Controller
uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Controllers.DatabaseController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/databases")
public class DatabaseController
extends Controller
The controller for all requests relating to "database" entities (route "/api/v1/databases")
Author:
Matthew Derbyshire

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("") public java.util.List<DatabaseNameIdProjection> getAll() throws InternalServerErrorException
      Gets all of the "database" records in the database, but only returns them as projections with just the name and ID
      Returns:
      A list of DatabaseNameIdProjection objects
      Throws:
      InternalServerErrorException - Thrown if there is a general error

    • getOne

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Database getOne​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws RecordNotFoundException, UnprocessableEntityException, InternalServerErrorException
      Gets the "database" record with the given ID
      Parameters:
      id - The PK of the "database" record
      Returns:
      The Database object for this "database" entity
      Throws:
      RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the requested record is not found
      UnprocessableEntityException - Thrown if there is something wrong with an entity
      InternalServerErrorException - Thrown if there is a general error

    • create

      @PostMapping("") public Database create​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Database newDatabase) throws UnprocessableEntityException, InternalServerErrorException
      Adds a new "database" record (and all of its inner child records) to the database
      Parameters:
      newDatabase - The new database record to be added
      Returns:
      The new "database" record that had been created
      Throws:
      UnprocessableEntityException - Thrown if there is something wrong with an entity
      InternalServerErrorException - Thrown if there is a general error

    • update

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") public Database update​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Database newDatabase, @PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws RecordNotFoundException, UnprocessableEntityException, InternalServerErrorException
      Updates the name of the "database" record with the given ID
      Parameters:
      newDatabase - An instance of Database, with the new name
      id - The ID of the database record to be updated
      Returns:
      The newly updated "database" record
      Throws:
      RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the requested record is not found
      UnprocessableEntityException - Thrown if there is something wrong with an entity
      InternalServerErrorException - Thrown if there is a general error

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void delete​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws BadRequestException, InternalServerErrorException, RecordNotFoundException
      Deletes the "database" record with the given ID
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the "database" record to delete
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - Thrown if the requested record is not found
      InternalServerErrorException - Thrown if there is a general error
      RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if there is something wrong with an entity
